ygData.subject: Re: Norrath Economy
ygData.msgSnippet: From: Perhaps a Princess...   ... unless ... Two things that I know of right off-hand, although whether or not a bard can wear them I
ygData.messageBody:
From: Perhaps a Princess... <sarah@...>


<snip>

> (I discovered I like the chain look on Wood elves instead... So this
> Ringmail MAY be traded out for a small size. But it isn't going away
unless
> I find something with AWESOME stats -- anyone know if any of the magical
> armor has a chain look?)


Two things that I know of right off-hand, although whether or not a bard can
wear them I can't say for sure. The first would be the Dwarven Ringmail
Tunic (aka Crush's Tunic), and the second would be the Bloodstained Tunic.
Beyond that, I can't think of any chain-look armor that's magical.

Lohre Soulsaver
Bristlebane
